name: 2024 2nd Asia Conference on Knowledge and Innovation Management
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published into Conference Proceedings as workshop of ACMLC, which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, etc for indexing. Journal: Selected papers will be published in the International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, CNKI, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library.
